title: Cape, second half 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallics, sequins
Technique: embroidery with chenille and metal thread on satin; lined with taffeta
description: Small cape for an ecclesiatic figure, the "Bambino". White satin embroidered with silk chenille and silk thread. All-over design of polychrome chenille dots with border design of a single flowering branch alternating chenille and silk. Lined with red taffeta.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cape, second half 18th century.Medium: silk, metallics, sequins
Technique: embroidery with chenille and metal thread on satin; lined with taffeta. 1899-2-8.
